name: MPNowPlayingSession
desc: An object that manages Now Playing information and remote commands for multiple players.

items.name: init(players: [AVPlayer])
items.desc: Creates a Now Playing session object.

items.name: var delegate: MPNowPlayingSessionDelegate?
items.desc: The Now Playing session’s delegate object.

items.name: protocol MPNowPlayingSessionDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the delegate interface for a Now Playing session.

items.name: var players: [AVPlayer]
items.desc: The array of players associated with this session.

items.name: func addPlayer(AVPlayer)
items.desc: Adds a player to the session.

items.name: func removePlayer(AVPlayer)
items.desc: Removes a player from the session.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this session is the app’s active Now Playing session.

items.name: var canBecomeActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this session can become the app’s active Now Playing session.

items.name: func becomeActiveIfPossible(completion: ((Bool) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Asks the system to make this session the active Now Playing session.

items.name: var nowPlayingInfoCenter: MPNowPlayingInfoCenter
items.desc: The Now Playing information center associated with this session.

items.name: var remoteCommandCenter: MPRemoteCommandCenter
items.desc: The remote command center associated with this session.
